title: Prepare capstone project outline
description: Write the high-level outline covering problem statement, solution, and demo flow.

title: Finish calendar event seed data
description: Create realistic overlapping and multi-day calendar events for demo purposes.

title: Implement todo list UI
description: Add create, complete, and delete functionality for todos.

title: Review database schema
description: Double-check events, calendars, and todos relationships.

title: Add completed-state styling
description: Visually distinguish completed todos (strikethrough, opacity, etc).

title: Test mobile layout
description: Verify calendar and todos look good on smaller screens.

title: Prepare presentation slides
description: Create slides explaining features, architecture, and demo flow.

title: Practice live demo
description: Run through creating events, overlaps, and completing todos.

title: Fix last-minute bugs
description: Address any UI or data issues discovered during demo practice.

title: Submit final capstone project
description: Upload final deliverables and verify submission confirmation.
